name: MindK
tagline: Creating software that lets your business thrive
description:
MindK is an independently owned, custom software development company – forever curious and ready to transform the way business is done.
We work remotely.
We have a decade long experience.
We live and breath the businesses we work with.
What we can help you with:
Full cycle product development; and
Digital transformation.
We are proud to say that:
4+ years is our average partnership duration
96% of our clients' projects have met deadlines
4/5 projects came to us thanks to recommendations from our clients.
Visit our website (mindk.com) to get the full idea of how we can help you ;)
